ComicInfo.Title: After; A Revolution in Oz. Chapter Thirteen: The Departure; A Revolution in Oz. Chapter Twelve: The Talking Monkey; A Revolution in Oz. Chapter Eleven: Emperor Bufkin
ComicInfo.Summary: Bufkin and Lily's heroic adventures are too big to contain in 3-page features, so this special full-issue epic will take us to the grand finale of our favorite flying monkey's greatest adventure, co-starring his sometimes girlfriend Lily with guest art by painter extraordinaire Shawn McManus!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-05 02:20:03. [CVDB373293] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 21:30:57. [Issue ID 1039383]
